FuncDef: The activate warranty command activates a warranty. The activate warranty command activates a warranty.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the time when a warranty is activated.
The time format is XXXX/XX/XX.

Specifies the warranty period of a warranty.
The value is a 32-bit integer ranging from 1 to 600.

Specifies the serial number of the device or component to be activated. The serial number must be in the serial-number-value_serial-number-value format.
The value is a string of 1 to 100 characters without spaces.

ExtraInfo: The warranty activated can be used to obtain the electronic copy of the product's or component's service life committed to customers.You can determine whether the warranty of a device or a part is activated based on the serial number.
